name: Magic Shop (itch) (deathsoul)
description:
A fun game about an alchemist who is helping cute creatures to grow their cute little things (like stones, pigs and seeds). Manage a group of clients in real time, who are not willing to wait long! >:)

Architecture: love2D engine, single-player, Lua-only project, no libraries were used apart from lua-hot-reload library which was used to speed up development by reloading code in real time (also written by the programmer of this game)

Assets: all are developed by our team members

Business model: possibly in-app purchases with reskins (for the main character)
